actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on the Judiciary.

official_title: A bill to amend the Voting Rights Act of 1965 to provide more practical voting assistance for certain language minority groups in Alaska.

summary.text: Amends the Voting Rights Act of 1965 to require States or political subdivisions to furnish only oral instructions, assistance, or other information relating to registration and voting in the case of Alaska natives.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Voting Rights Act of 1965 to provide more practical voting assistance for certain language minority groups in Alaska.
